Articles.Content:
I have simple challenge for you. Make a working seaplane (must be ambhibia to start from runway). It can be a flying boat or floatplane or any kind of seaplane do you invent. I suggest to use MK3 fuselage to make a floats or body of flying boat and place wings and engines above the crew hatch (like this pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/wodnosamolot 2'nd graphic). On screens (or beter - video) show the start time, landing on water and 2'nd start from water. I did not succeed. Below you can see my attempts from 0.15.2.

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/812/ksp2012081515370336.png/

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/21/ksp2012081515361520.png/

Sorry for my english im lernig it only a very short time.
Should it be stock only or can we use mods?
im not sure but i think this is impossible since vehicles are destroyed on impact with water

@nerdboy64 As soon as you want but you better only stock.

@me2000000 It's possible. I landed on water and not crash. But i cant start from it.
its possible but hard i just now created a boat

i just now created a hovercraft plane with ability to land on water and lift off

its really simple no mods used

you can land without paraschute but with my 14 FPS is parachute best choice

http://www./?a52695kjkyeiq02

sorry for my english i still learning

VTOL water craft count right? Made one a few days ago for as a bonus to a Reddit KSP challenge. Original objective was to just reach the Arch (easy), but I like to play on hard mode

http://imgur.com/a/GSs1j

Here's my three-kerbal seaplane:
